mapper.select: select p.product_id, p.name, p.create_time, p.category_id, p.attributes, c.category_id "category.category_id", c.create_time "category.createTime", c.name "category.name" from product p left join category c on p.category_id = c.category_id where p.product_id = #{productId}

select p.product_id as product_id, p.name as name, p.create_time as create_time, p.category_id as category_id, p.attributes as attributes, c.category_id "c_category_id", c.create_time as category_create_time, c.name "category_name", g.goods_id as goods_id, g.create_time as goods_create_time, g.attributes as goods_attributes, g.original_price as goods_original_price, g.sell_price as goods_sell_price from product p left join category c on p.category_id = c.category_id left join goods g on p.product_id = g.product_id where p.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT p.product_id, p.create_time as product_create_time, p.attributes as product_attributes, p.name, p.category_id, d.goods_id, d.attributes as goods_attributes, d.create_time as goods_create_time, d.original_price, d.sell_price, d.total_sell_number FROM product AS p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.goods_id, b.create_time, b.attributes, b.original_price, b.sell_price, b.product_id AS product_id, SUM(a.sell_number) AS total_sell_number FROM inventory AS a LEFT JOIN goods b ON a.goods_id = b.goods_id GROUP BY b.product_id ) AS d ON p.product_id = d.product_id ORDER BY d.total_sell_number DESC LIMIT #{offsetStart},#{rowCount}

SELECT p.product_id, p.create_time as product_create_time, p.attributes as product_attributes, p.name, p.category_id, d.goods_id, d.attributes as goods_attributes, d.create_time as goods_create_time, d.original_price, d.sell_price, d.total_inventory_number FROM product AS p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.goods_id, b.create_time, b.attributes, b.original_price, b.sell_price, b.product_id AS product_id, SUM(a.inventory_number) AS total_inventory_number FROM inventory AS a LEFT JOIN goods b ON a.goods_id = b.goods_id GROUP BY b.product_id ) AS d ON p.product_id = d.product_id ORDER BY d.total_inventory_number DESC LIMIT #{offsetStart},#{rowCount}

SELECT p.product_id, p.create_time as product_create_time, p.attributes as product_attributes, p.name, p.category_id, d.goods_id, d.attributes as goods_attributes, d.create_time as goods_create_time, d.original_price, d.sell_price FROM product AS p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.goods_id, b.create_time, b.attributes, b.original_price, b.sell_price, b.product_id AS product_id FROM goods AS b GROUP BY b.product_id ) AS d ON p.product_id = d.product_id ORDER BY d.create_time LIMIT #{offsetStart},#{rowCount}
